member.summary: This is the packet length including the start and end bytes. there are _packetLength - 3 bytes for the payload.

member.name: M:DGevolt.Product.AT32V1.HealthCheck
member.summary: This is a Private function that should be used to check that all the public properties are at sane defaults, since the properties are public, users can accidentally make some large changes to the library that will be out of the intended library design / intention spec.
